actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to provide permanent duty-free entry for certain mixtures of hot red peppers and salt.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant permanent duty-free treatment of mixtures of mashed or macerated hot red peppers and salt. Repeals a specified provision of the Schedules granting temporary duty-free treatment of such articles. Authorizes a refund of duties paid on such articles prior to the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide permanent duty-free entry for certain mixtures of hot red peppers and salt.
